description: Situated right in the heart of Brescia, this new 4.0 restaurant with geothermic heating and technologically controlled energy serves contemporary-style cuisine in a modern bistro with a “wine theatre” in the middle of the dining room. There’s also an attractive space with a brick vaulted ceiling in the basement.
